name: penultimately
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a position that is second from the last: Penultimately, the author considers the issue of ageism, before the final chapter offers predictions for the future. These words are penultimately stressed (= on the syllable before the last syllable).
More examplesFewer examplesPenultimately, we present our strategy for the next year.Penultimately, it was the sales manager's turn to share his knowledge on the growth of the British food industry.Stress in these words is predictable and occurs penultimately.
